replies.body: Do you get anything if you already have all 5 ultimate skins.
I think you get the skins as permanents in loot

Man I liked championship riven as a reward. having that super exclusive reward for pick'em was a really cool way to let people have a chance of getting one. But I can see why they're afraid to do that, everyone could in theory get pick'ems right and then there's hundreds of thousands of championship riven skins around
G2, SKT,FPX and IG are the teams that will make it to the knockout stage for sure
It's hard to say until play ins are finished.
IG is not a for sure at all lol. TL could beat them, DWG could be in that group too. IG looked shit this split. However if SPY gets put in that group then they do have a very high chance.
